name: Me.Me.Me
description: A simple puzzle platformer game, where player needs to figure out how to fix the future self by jumping around milestone of life for 5 seconds and altering the past. Presented in cute style with dark humour bits. Control: Arrow keys to move and jump. Z key to shoot if available. If player dies, she will have to move to past milestone; if survived the 5 seconds visit she will move to the future milestone. Objective: Kill the Dragon!
